sentences.english: "It'll help you avoid mindless munching," she said.

sentences.english: He strums his guitar and sings, his voice so sweet that it's heartbreaking.
sentences.chinese: 他漫不經心地邊彈邊唱，聲音如此甜美，令人心碎。

sentences.english: He was sure that the casualness of the gesture was deliberate.

sentences.english: It is shame that there are so many people who waste their time carelessly.

sentences.english: This one Josephine did not dive into, she was unconcern for her part.

definition: not a word or movement (idiom); remaining calm and collected/not batting an eyelid
as if nothing had happened (idiom); calmly/nonchalantly
to sketch in light shades/to play down/to deemphasize (idiom)
to harbor evil designs/to harbor malicious intentions
disordered and in a mess (idiom); all mixed up and chaotic
ordinary and mediocre (idiom); nothing to write home about
untainted by even a speck of dust (idiom); selfless and incorruptible/spotless
bored to death (idiom)/bored stiff/overcome with boredom
